name: WizArt Studios
motto: Have you ever stumbled upon an idea and been unable to process it in terms of an image?
hook: Well, we got a team of professional artists who have helped a lot of such ideas turn into reality.
team_description: The team is composed of talented, hardworking and well-experienced apprentices who have been in the NFT space for far too long to understand what attracts an average Solana Investor, the result of which we have won multiple art contests (Communi3 being the biggest) and made an art piece for Elixir as well. Working with us will ensure that you will align all the ideas flowing through your head and choose the right path for your upcoming product/service. A few magic words and... POOF. Voil√†, there it is!
skills_description: We offer everything an NFT Project needs to attract potential investors. If at any point in time you feel overwhelmed by looking at so many options, don't worry. Take a long breath and book an appointment as the special wizardry will only happen there.
contact_us_heading: We would love to hear more from you
contact_us_description: Feel free to reach out to us at anytime and schedule a meeting to talk about the future of your business.

theTeam.name: Turtle
theTeam.short_description: Doing art and consuming potions all the time
theTeam.description: The coffee+cigarette guy that makes art which is somewhat decent, also I love cats.

theTeam.name: Gabriela
theTeam.short_description: The canvas moves under her hand, not the other way around
theTeam.description: Hi I'm Gabriela! I've been artist since I can remember. I like to experiment with different type of art styles and mediums. I'm a cat lover and owner and I like to watch a lot of anime.

theTeam.name: Kriko
theTeam.short_description: Loves gadgets and magic powders. Be cautious around him
theTeam.description: I am the coder of the group. I always strive to expand my field of knowledge further and accept new endevours in the world of programming. My joints are fat like my commits. Main focus is on Javascript stack and soon more WEB3 solution as well. Sleep schedule is ruined since 1998.
theTeam.skills: HTML; CSS; Javascript and JS Frameworks(React, Angular); JQuery; NodeJS; Typescript; Redux/Flux; Knowledge of AWS Services; ElasticSearch Stack; Databases - PostgreSQL, SQL Server, MongoDB, Sequilize, Firebase; REST API

theTeam.name: Amoros
theTeam.short_description: A creature from an unknown dimension
theTeam.description: Cuz my name is too long so i need to reffer to dead Star Wars characters, 21, but the beard makes me 50. Call me Grandalf.

theTeam.name: Wizard
theTeam.description: The brand scaling dude, obsessed with wizards and blunts. I do a lot of twitter spaces.

services.description: Provide the vision to our artists and they will work with you to develop and design your idea into a lucrative NFT. Yeah, that's all they need!

In this Web3 world, how you represent yourself matters a lot. And your socials is your first encounter with the Web3 World. Want to look your best? Our Artists will design a custom 1/1 PFP and Banner and Art for you according to your taste
WizArt Studios makes it simple to design, maintain, store, and distribute video and illustration assests for your social media.

services.quote: Your brand is the single most important investment you can make in your business- Steve Forbes
services.description: We can't argue with that, can we? Since "THE BRAND" of your project is so important to you, we will provide you with the best Branding Assets which suit your vision.

logos.name: NFA logo
logos.description: NON Financial Advisors is a project that we executed completely on our own and it is yet to be launched. The artwork is inspired by the 80s and 90s, trying to envision a more retro art approach. For them, we created unique logo and artwork used for their marketing campaigns.

nftprojects.name: Good Mood Dudes
nftprojects.description: Good Mood Dudes is a Web3 retail experience NFT backed by a real life product: The Ayoka drink. We have worked with them on multiple sketches some of which are yet to be released on their socials!

nftprojects.name: NFA
nftprojects.description: NON Financial Advisors is a project that we executed completely on our own and it is yet to be launched. The artwork is inspired by the 80s and 90s, trying to envision a more retro art approach. Along with the logo, we created NFT artworks for their upcoming project launch.

nftprojects.name: FastFoodies
nftprojects.description: Those are some sneak peaks from a collection called FastFoodies, which unfortunately did not get to see light, because the founders vanished into thin air.

fanart.name: The Artist Tears collection
fanart.description: A wonderful collection of all the artist tears collected in a beautiful marketable transparent milk carton to display for the world to see. Yes, these are our tears indeed. Keep in mind, they are magical. So be cautious when using.

fanart.name: Tigers
fanart.description: Tigers NFT project fanart mixed with Pokemon vibes to bring back the old memories before the big digitalization began and everyone was just playing Pokemon on Nintendo and Gameboy.

fanart.name: Primates
fanart.description: Primates NFT project fanart created to flex on all them young bloods. You get what I'm sayin cuuz?

fanart.name: Asset Bender
fanart.description: Twitter banner for AssetBender to help them spread Web3 for the Masses and obtain control of all the elements under their will.

customrequests.name: MetaTattooClub
customrequests.description: MetaTatooClub is an NFT project situated in the world of tattoo art providing wide variety of utility. WizArt Studios created an illustration displaying their whole roadmap in an eye-catching and creative way. They are big tattoos maxis, and numerours team members from their company are quite popular in real life as tatoo artists. One of them did tatoos for Post Malone. Isn't that cool?
